front.title: Criteria and Assessment for DetNet Services Forwarding Plane Methods

abstract.t: This memo proposes methods to define, document and assess common criteria for the evaluation of forwarding plane mechanisms intended to be used within the DetNet WG as well as by implementers, operators and vendors that need to compare and select such mechanisms. This document is not intended to become an RFC but does at this point in time soslely intend to help the process of documentation, assessment and comparison. The goals of this memo may change in later revisions.
